meta.title: Get All Customer Attribute Values - Customer Attribute Values - Customers v3 - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns a list of Customer Attribute Values. Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more...

blocks.data: Returns a list of Customer Attribute Values. Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Customers | modify | `store_v2_customers` |
|  Customers | read-only | `store_v2_customers_read_only` |
| Stored Payment Instruments| modify | `store_stored_payment_instruments`|
| Stored Payment Instruments| read-only | `store_stored_payment_instruments_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

customer_id:in.description: Filter items by the customer ID. `customer_id:in=23,24,55`

attribute_id:in.description: Filter items by the attribute ID. `attribute_id:in=1,2`

name.description: Filter items by the attribute name. `name=age`

date_created:max.description: Filter items by maximum `date_created`. ISO 8601 full-date is required, ISO 8601 full-time is not required. UNIX timestamp also accepted. `date_created=2021-01-07` or `date_created=1610051296000`

date_created:min.description: Filter items by minimum `date_created`. ISO 8601 full-date is required, ISO 8601 full-time is not required. UNIX timestamp also accepted. `date_created=2021-01-07` or `date_created=1610051296000`

date_modified:max.description: Filter items by maximum `date_modified`. ISO 8601 full-date is required, ISO 8601 full-time is not required. UNIX timestamp also accepted. `date_created=2021-01-07` or `date_created=1610051296000`

date_modified:min.description: Filter items by mininum `date_modified`. ISO 8601 full-date is required, ISO 8601 full-time is not required. UNIX timestamp also accepted. `date_created=2021-01-07` or `date_created=1610051296000`

data.title: CustomerAttributeValueCollectionResponse
data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

attribute_value.description:
Attribute value. This will always be a string, regardless of the attributes type. 

Corresponds to `value` used in customer attribute values `PUT` requests.

date_modified.description: The date on which the customer attribute value was modified.

date_created.description: The date of which the customer attribute value was created.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.title: Links
links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
